casebody.data:
JAMES TREGARTHEN & SONS CO., Libelant-Appellee, v. Coal Hoister GOLD DIGGER, Her Tackle, Apparel, etc. Charles E. Forsythe and James A. Forsythe, Copartners, Doing Business as Forsythe Brothers, Claimants-Appellant. No. 359. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 18, 1931. George W. Tucker, of New York City (Chauncey E. Treadwell, of New York City, of counsel), for claimants. Alexander, Ash & Jones, of New York City (Edward Ash and Lawson R. Jones, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [44 F. (2d) 660] affirmed.
